name: Hardest Reaction Test - Avoid Killing Black Tiles and Survive The Stick Finger Game
name_original: Hardest Reaction Test - Avoid Killing Black Tiles and Survive The Stick Finger Game
description:
Save your finger from dangers, DO NOT getting cut, can your survive the killing challenges?

It's never been so easy to play, just hold your finger on the screen and try to stay as long as possible!

- Test and train your reaction speed.
- Challenge 30 Unique levels.
- Compete your score with friends.
- Challenge CRAZY endless modes.
